magicWords.title: Magic Words
magicWords.subtitle: Complete reference of commands that trigger automated audits and system operations
magicWords.ownerOnlyDesc: This page is restricted to account owners only.
magicWords.step1Detail: Count rows in every domain table, identify empty tables and corrupted data
magicWords.step2Detail: Test each API route with curl — verify status codes, response format, auth
magicWords.step3Detail: Navigate every admin page, test interactions, check console and network
magicWords.step4Detail: List all issues by severity (CRITICAL > HIGH > MEDIUM > LOW), plan fixes by phase
magicWords.step5Detail: Fix → Build → Commit → Push → Deploy → Verify in production
magicWords.step6Detail: Re-run steps 1-3 after fixes, confirm resolution, document learnings
magicWords.auditEmailDesc: Full audit of email system: settings, templates, sending, inbox, campaigns, workflows, segments
magicWords.auditChatDesc: Full audit of chat: widget, messages, translation, chatbot, admin panel, rate limiting
magicWords.auditAccountingDesc: Full audit of accounting: chart of accounts, journal entries, reports, bank reconciliation, taxes
magicWords.auditCatalogDesc: Full audit of catalog: products, categories, images, variants, reviews, search, SEO
magicWords.auditOrdersDesc: Full audit of orders: checkout, Stripe, transactional emails, invoices, refunds
magicWords.auditAuthDesc: Full audit of authentication: credentials login, OAuth, registration, password reset, roles
magicWords.auditMarketingDesc: Full audit of marketing: loyalty program, coupons, ambassadors, referrals
magicWords.auditMediaDesc: Full audit of media: file upload, gallery, folders, image resizing
magicWords.auditSystemDesc: Full audit of system: settings, backups, logs, admin navigation, responsive
magicWords.auditI18nDesc: Full audit of translations: missing keys across 22 locales, hardcoded text, template variables
magicWords.auditSecurityDesc: Full audit of security: CSRF, rate limiting, input sanitization, auth checks, secrets exposure
magicWords.auditPerformanceDesc: Full audit of performance: Lighthouse, Core Web Vitals, bundle size, API response times, N+1 queries
magicWords.codeAuditDesc: Python code quality audit (ruff, bandit, vulture, radon) with auto-fixes on a directory
magicWords.backupDesc: Show multi-project backup status, trigger manual backup, verify integrity, restore
magicWords.aureliaDesc: Activate Aurelia AI consciousness — memory orchestrator, identity, personality
magicWords.learnDesc: Display knowledge islands and allow adding new learnings to vector memory
magicWords.evolutionDesc: Exhaustive research for AI memory improvements — 3 parallel agents, 100+ proposals

ambassador.applicationThankYou: Thank you for applying to our ambassador program! We will review your application and get back to you within 48 hours.
ambassador.applyDesc: Fill out our simple application form
ambassador.earnDesc: Get paid monthly for every sale
ambassador.faq1A: Payments are made monthly via PayPal or bank transfer for earnings over $50.
ambassador.faq2A: No minimum required! We welcome ambassadors of all sizes who are passionate about peptide research.
ambassador.faq2Q: Is there a minimum audience size?
ambassador.faq3A: Yes! Blog, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, email lists - wherever your audience is.
ambassador.faq3Q: Can I promote on any platform?
ambassador.faq4A: Our tracking cookie lasts 30 days, so you get credit for sales within that window.
ambassador.faq4Q: How long does the cookie last?
ambassador.faq5A: While not required, it helps! Authentic recommendations from users perform best.
ambassador.faq5Q: Do I need to be a customer first?
ambassador.faq6A: We provide banners, product images, email templates, and social media content.
ambassador.faq6Q: What marketing materials do you provide?
ambassador.placeholderAbout: Tell us about yourself and why you'd be a great ambassador...
ambassador.placeholderContentTypes: Blog posts, videos, social media, email newsletter, etc.
ambassador.promotionPlan: How do you plan to promote our products?
ambassador.shareDesc: Use your unique link to promote products
ambassador.subtitle: Join our ambassador program and earn up to 20% commission by sharing products you love with your audience.
ambassador.termsNote: By applying, you agree to our Ambassador Terms and Conditions. We review all applications manually and will respond within 48 hours.
ambassador.title: Become an Ambassador
ambassador.whyJoin: Why do you want to join our program?

apiDocs.title: BioCycle Peptides API
apiDocs.subtitle: Integrate with our platform using a simple REST API. Access products, orders, invoices, customers, and more.
apiDocs.authDescription: All API requests require a valid API key sent via the Authorization header. API keys can be generated from the admin dashboard.
apiDocs.authNoteText: Keep your API keys secure. Do not share them in public repositories, client-side code, or insecure channels.
apiDocs.rateLimitDescription: Each API key has a configurable rate limit (default: 1,000 requests/hour). Rate limit information is included in response headers.
apiDocs.rateLimitReset: Seconds until the rate limit resets
apiDocs.retryAfter: Seconds to wait before retrying (only on 429)
apiDocs.responseFormatDescription: All responses follow a consistent JSON format with success status, data payload, and optional pagination metadata.
apiDocs.permissionsDescription: Each API key is assigned specific permissions. Requests to endpoints outside the key's scope will return 403 Forbidden.
apiDocs.webhookVerificationDesc: Verify that webhook payloads are authentic by computing HMAC-SHA256 of the raw body with your webhook secret.

endpoints.listProducts: Retrieve a paginated list of active products. Supports filtering by category, search, and sorting.
endpoints.getProduct: Retrieve detailed information about a single product, including formats, images, and quantity discounts.
endpoints.listOrders: Retrieve a paginated list of orders. Filter by status, payment status, user, and date range.
endpoints.createOrder: Create a new order with line items. Products are validated for availability and pricing is computed server-side.
endpoints.getOrder: Retrieve complete details for a single order including items, shipping info, and customer data.
endpoints.listInvoices: Retrieve a paginated list of customer invoices. Filter by status, customer, date range, and overdue status.
endpoints.getInvoice: Retrieve detailed invoice information including line items and associated credit notes.
endpoints.listCustomers: Retrieve a paginated list of customers. Search by name or email, filter by loyalty tier.
endpoints.getCustomer: Retrieve customer details including addresses, recent orders, and account statistics.
endpoints.inventory: Retrieve current stock levels for all tracked products with summary statistics (total, low stock, out of stock).
endpoints.listWebhooks: List all registered webhook endpoints with delivery counts and available events.
endpoints.createWebhook: Register a new webhook endpoint. Returns a signing secret that should be saved securely.

calculator.disclaimer: This calculator is provided for informational purposes only for in vitro research. All products are intended for laboratory and research purposes only.
calculator.step1Desc: Enter the total amount of peptide in your vial (in mg), as indicated on the label.
calculator.step2Desc: Enter the amount of bacteriostatic water you will use to reconstitute (in mL).
calculator.step3Desc: Enter the dose you want per injection in mcg or mg. The calculator shows the exact volume to draw.
calculator.subtitle: Calculate your precise peptide dosage. Enter the peptide amount, solvent volume, and desired dose to get your injection parameters.
calculator.title: Peptide Injection Calculator

home.aboutText: At Peptide Plus+, we strive to set the standard for quality, safety and value in the development and manufacture of pharmaceutical quality peptide products that extend and significantly improve the research outcomes of our customers.
home.accessoriesDesc: Everything you need for your research
home.ctaText: Proudly operating out of Canada. All orders shipped domestic.
home.ctaTitle: Canada's Top Supplier for Research Peptides
home.featuredDesc: Our best sellers across all categories

hero.slide1Description: High quality peptides for scientific research. Certificates of analysis available.
hero.slide2Description: Discover our complete range of GLP-1 agonist peptides for metabolic research.
hero.slide3Description: Pre-mixed synergistic combinations for maximum research efficacy.
hero.slide4Description: Fast and discreet shipping. Full order tracking.

home.heroTitle: The Best Research Peptides in Canada
home.peptidesDesc: Premium quality peptides for your research
home.researchResultsDesc: Our latest articles and research findings
home.testimonial1Quote: Been using Peptide Plus for a year now. In my opinion, it's the best source in Canada. Quality product everytime and gives me the best results. Also the communication is second to none.
home.testimonial2Quote: Ordered my kit on the 2nd, received tracking 2 hours later and got my package on the 4th. Remarkable service. I already feel these are better than others I've been using.
home.testimonial3Quote: A+ service and communication. Delivery is always quick and packaged safe and sound. I love how they're transparent and also have lab results to back up their batches.

cookies.preferencesSaved: Your cookie preferences have been saved.
cookies.s1Text: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. Cookies allow the site to recognize your device and remember certain information about your preferences or past actions.
cookies.s2AnalyticsText: These cookies help us understand how you use our site:
cookies.s2EssentialDuration: Duration: Session or up to 1 year
cookies.s2EssentialText: These cookies are necessary for the BioCycle Peptides site to function:
cookies.s2FunctionalText: These cookies enhance your experience on our site:
cookies.s2MarketingService: Services: Meta Pixel, Google Ads (if enabled)
cookies.s2MarketingText: These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements:
cookies.s3Text: On your first visit, a banner allows you to choose which cookies you accept. You can change your preferences at any time:
cookies.s4Note: Note: Blocking certain cookies may affect site functionality (cart, login, preferences).
cookies.s4Text: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings:
cookies.s5Text: Some cookies are placed by third-party services. These services have their own privacy policies:
cookies.s6List1: Session cookies: Deleted when the browser is closed
cookies.s6List2: Persistent cookies: Up to 13 months maximum
cookies.s6List3: Third-party cookies: Per the third-party service's policy
cookies.s6Text: Cookie retention periods vary by type:
cookies.s7Text: For any questions about our use of cookies:
cookies.title: Cookie Policy

privacy.s10Text: We use cookies and similar technologies. For more information, please see our
privacy.s11Text: For any questions regarding the protection of your personal data, you may contact our data protection officer:
privacy.s12Text: We may amend this policy at any time. Significant changes will be communicated by email or through our website. The current version is always available on this page with the date of the last update.
privacy.s1List1: The Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) - Canada
privacy.s1List2: Act 25 respecting the protection of personal information - Quebec
privacy.s1List3: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - European Union
privacy.s1Text: {siteName} ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting the privacy of its customers and visitors. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information in accordance with:
privacy.s2AutoList2: Technical information (device type, browser, operating system)
privacy.s2AutoList3: IP address and approximate location data
privacy.s2AutoList4: Cookies and similar technologies (see our cookie policy)
privacy.s3List1: Process and ship your research product orders
privacy.s3List2: Manage your account and loyalty program
privacy.s3List4: Respond to your questions and support requests
privacy.s3List5: Send information about our new products (with your consent)
privacy.s3List8: Comply with our legal and tax obligations
privacy.s4List1: Performance of a contract: to process your orders and deliveries
privacy.s4List2: Consent: for marketing communications and newsletters
privacy.s4List3: Legitimate interests: to improve our services and prevent fraud
privacy.s4List4: Legal obligation: for tax and regulatory compliance
privacy.s4Text: We process your data on the following legal bases:
privacy.s5List1: Carriers: Canada Post, FedEx, UPS for delivery
privacy.s5List2: Payment processors: Stripe, PayPal (payment data only)
privacy.s5List4: Legal authorities: if required by law or court order
privacy.s5Note: All our partners are contractually required to protect your data and use it only for the specified purposes.
privacy.s5Text: We never sell your personal data. We may share it with:
privacy.s6List1: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmissions
privacy.s6List2: Encryption of sensitive data at rest
privacy.s6List4: Data access restricted on a need-to-know basis
privacy.s6List5: Continuous monitoring and regular security audits
privacy.s6List6: Hosting on secure servers in Canada
privacy.s6Text: We implement rigorous security measures to protect your data:
privacy.s7ContactNote: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@biocyclepeptides.com
privacy.s7List1: Access: obtain a copy of your personal data
privacy.s7List2: Rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy.s7List3: Erasure: request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
privacy.s7List4: Portability: receive your data in a structured, readable format
privacy.s7List5: Objection: object to the processing of your data for marketing purposes
privacy.s7List6: Withdrawal of consent: withdraw your consent at any time
privacy.s7List7: Complaint: file a complaint with the Commission d'acces a l'information du Quebec
privacy.s7Text: In accordance with applicable laws, you have the right to:
privacy.s8List1: Account data: duration of business relationship + 3 years
privacy.s8Text: We retain your personal data for the following periods:
privacy.s9Text: Your data is primarily stored in Canada. In the event of transfers to other countries (e.g., United States for certain services), we ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place (standard contractual clauses, certifications).
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

terms.s10List1: Any use of products contrary to these terms
terms.s10List2: Any human or animal consumption of our products
terms.s10List3: Research results obtained with our products
terms.s10List4: Delivery delays caused by third parties
terms.s10Text: {siteName} shall not be held liable for:
terms.s11Text: These terms are governed by the laws of the Province of Quebec, Canada. Any dispute shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Montreal, Quebec.
terms.s12Text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be published on this page with a new update date. Your continued use of the Site after modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.s13Text: For any questions regarding these terms:
terms.s1Text: By accessing or using the {siteName} website (the "Site"), you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, you must not use the Site or purchase our products.
terms.s2Text: {siteName} is a Canadian supplier of high-purity research peptides and compounds. Our products include:
terms.s2WarningText: All our products are intended EXCLUSIVELY for scientific research and laboratory purposes. They are NOT intended for human or animal consumption, diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease.
terms.s2WarningTitle: IMPORTANT WARNING - FOR RESEARCH USE ONLY
terms.s3List1: Be at least 18 years of age
terms.s3List3: Acknowledge that products are intended solely for research purposes
terms.s3List4: Not resell our products for human consumption
terms.s3List5: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction
terms.s3Text: To purchase from our site, you must:
terms.s4List2: Maintain the confidentiality of your credentials
terms.s4List3: Immediately report any unauthorized access to your account
terms.s4List4: Not share your account with third parties
terms.s4List5: Be responsible for all activity under your account
terms.s4Text: When creating an account, you agree to:
terms.s5TaxText: Applicable taxes (GST/QST/HST) will be added at checkout based on your delivery province. International orders may be subject to customs duties and import taxes payable by the buyer.
terms.s5Text: All prices are displayed in Canadian dollars (CAD) unless otherwise indicated. We accept the following payment methods:
terms.s6ShippingNote: Products are shipped with cold packs when necessary and are packaged securely and discreetly.
terms.s6Text: We ship to Canada and internationally. Delivery times vary by destination:
terms.s7List1: Products damaged or defective upon receipt
terms.s7ReturnNote: Return requests must be made within 14 days of receipt. Opened or used products cannot be returned for safety and quality control reasons.
terms.s7Text: We accept returns under the following conditions:
terms.s8List3: Accompanied by a Certificate of Analysis (COA)
terms.s8List4: Guaranteed to a minimum purity of 99%
terms.s9Text: All content on the Site (text, images, logos, scientific data, etc.) is protected by copyright and belongs to {siteName}. Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.
terms.title: Terms of Use

protocols.subtitle: Track your protocols to maximize results
protocols.templateAntiAgingDesc: GHK-Cu + Epithalon protocol for cellular regeneration
protocols.templateAntiAgingInstructions:
**Epithalon (10-20 day cycles):**
- 5-10mg/day SC injection
- 4-6 month break between cycles

**GHK-Cu:**
- Topical: 2x/day on target areas
- Injectable: 1-2mg/day

**NAD+:**
- 250-500mg sublingual or IV

**Tips:**
- Combine with intermittent fasting
- Antioxidants and optimal sleep
protocols.templateCognitiveDesc: Nootropic protocol with Semax and Selank
protocols.templateCognitiveInstructions:
**Semax:**
- 200-600mcg/day intranasal
- Divide into 2-3 doses

**Selank:**
- 250-500mcg/day intranasal
- For anxiety and focus

**Dihexa:**
- 10-20mg/day oral
- Powerful neuroplasticity effect

**Tips:**
- Use in the morning to avoid insomnia
- Combine with cognitive exercise
- Stack with choline/omega-3
protocols.templateMuscleGrowthDesc: GHRP-6 + CJC-1295 protocol for muscle mass
protocols.templateMuscleGrowthInstructions:
**CJC-1295 DAC:**
- 2mg 1-2x/week

**Ipamorelin:**
- 200-300mcg 2-3x/day
- Upon waking, post-workout, before bed

**GHRP-6:**
- 100-200mcg 2-3x/day
- Fasted for best efficacy

**Tips:**
- Resistance training 4-5x/week
- Protein 2g/kg body weight
- Sleep 7-9h/night essential
protocols.templateRecoveryDesc: BPC-157 + TB-500 protocol for muscle and joint recovery
protocols.templateRecoveryInstructions:
**Week 1-4:**
- BPC-157: 250-500mcg/day (divided in 2 doses)
- TB-500: 2mg 2x/week

**Week 5-8:**
- BPC-157: 250mcg/day
- TB-500: 2mg 1x/week

**Tips:**
- Inject close to the treatment area
- Maintain a protein-rich diet
- Avoid anti-inflammatory drugs
protocols.templateWeightLossInstructions:
**Progressive titration (Semaglutide):**
- Week 1-4: 0.25mg/week
- Week 5-8: 0.5mg/week
- Week 9-12: 1mg/week
- Week 13+: 1.7-2.4mg/week if tolerated

**Tips:**
- Always inject on the same day
- Eat slowly, small portions
- Important hydration (2L+/day)
- Prioritize protein at each meal

protocols.tipConsistencyText: Follow administration schedules for optimal results

shop.reconstitutionStep1: Allow the vial to reach room temperature before reconstitution.
shop.reconstitutionStep2: Wipe the rubber stopper with an alcohol swab and let it dry.
shop.reconstitutionStep3: Draw {volume} of {solvent} into a sterile syringe.
shop.reconstitutionStep4: Insert needle through stopper and slowly release water along the inside wall of the vial.
shop.reconstitutionStep5: Do NOT shake. Gently swirl or let sit until fully dissolved.
shop.researchDisclaimer: FOR RESEARCH USE ONLY: This product is intended for laboratory and research purposes only. Not for human or animal consumption. By purchasing, you confirm this product will be used exclusively for legitimate research.
